channel.title: Techmeme
channel.description: Top news and commentary for technology 's leaders, from all around the web

item.title: Tinder redesigns profile pages to add prompt conversation starters, basic info tags, and quizzes, and updates its app with new animations, a dark mode, and more (Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch)
item.description:
Ivan Mehta / TechCrunch:
Tinder redesigns profile pages to add prompt conversation starters, basic info tags, and quizzes, and updates its app with new animations, a dark mode, and more  —  Tinder is revamping its profile pages to make them more informative and create easier starting points for conversations.

item.title: A look at OpenAI 's wild weekend, as an internal debate over its future became public; investors say OpenAI still has not said why Altman was fired so abruptly (Financial Times)
item.description:
Financial Times:
A look at OpenAI's wild weekend, as an internal debate over its future became public; investors say OpenAI still has not said why Altman was fired so abruptly  —  Internal debate about ChatGPT maker's mission exploded into view during wild few days of corporate drama

item.title: While the White House may condemn Elon Musk, the US recently signed a $1.2B SpaceX deal for Starshield, a key China deterrent, showing its dependence on him (New York Times)
item.description:
New York Times:
While the White House may condemn Elon Musk, the US recently signed a $1.2B SpaceX deal for Starshield, a key China deterrent, showing its dependence on him  —  Rarely has the U.S. government so depended on the technology provided by a single technologist with views that it has so publicly declared repugnant.

item.title: A look at the AI Security Summit, an invite-only event hosted by Scale AI to discuss AI 's security issues, with 100+ executives, VCs, and officials attending (Rachel Metz/Bloomberg)
item.description:
Rachel Metz / Bloomberg:
A look at the AI Security Summit, an invite-only event hosted by Scale AI to discuss AI's security issues, with 100+ executives, VCs, and officials attending  —  More than 100 AI executives and insiders, venture capitalists and government officials gathered at a Utah resort to discuss security issues …

item.title: Humane 's AI Pin, marketed as a fashion accessory, is effectively a high-tech brooch, typically worn with outwear, which may present challenges in hot climates (Victoria Song/The Verge)
item.description:
Victoria Song / The Verge:
Humane's AI Pin, marketed as a fashion accessory, is effectively a high-tech brooch, typically worn with outwear, which may present challenges in hot climates  —  Before you disrupt everything, you have to deeply consider the current cultural norms or no one will wear your wearable.

item.title: A profile of Beryl Tomay, a lifelong Amazon executive who made two early career mistakes that she now eagerly discusses, as she leads Amazon 's "last mile "unit (Sebastian Herrera/Wall Street Journal)
item.description:
Sebastian Herrera / Wall Street Journal:
A profile of Beryl Tomay, a lifelong Amazon executive who made two early career mistakes that she now eagerly discusses, as she leads Amazon's “last mile” unit  —  Beryl Tomay is open about her early career mistakes, in hopes her experiences can help others who are now just starting out.

item.title: Xiaomi reports Q3 revenue up 0.6% YoY to ~$9.9B, its first gain in almost two years, and a ~$684M net income, both above est., buoyed by rising smartphone sales (Bloomberg)
item.description:
Bloomberg:
Xiaomi reports Q3 revenue up 0.6% YoY to ~$9.9B, its first gain in almost two years, and a ~$684M net income, both above est., buoyed by rising smartphone sales  —  - Smartphone maker's revenue and net income top estimates  — Electronics manufacturer also expanding to electric vehicles

item.title: Lenovo Legion Go review: nice screen, detachable controllers, and FPS mode that simulates a mouse but using Windows is frustrating and terrible battery life (Eric Ravenscraft/Wired)
item.description:
Eric Ravenscraft / Wired:
Lenovo Legion Go review: nice screen, detachable controllers, and FPS mode that simulates a mouse but using Windows is frustrating and terrible battery life  —  This is one of the better attempts at a very bad idea: Putting Windows on a gaming handheld. … Rating:

item.title: OpenAI 's board "stands by its decision as the only path to advance and defend the mission of OpenAI "and criticizes "Sam 's behavior and lack of transparency "(New York Times)
item.description:
New York Times:
OpenAI's board “stands by its decision as the only path to advance and defend the mission of OpenAI” and criticizes “Sam's behavior and lack of transparency”  —  The announcement seemed to cap a tumultuous weekend for the A.I. company, as Mr. Altman made a push to reclaim his job.

item.title: Satya Nadella says Sam Altman, Greg Brockman, and OpenAI staff will join Microsoft 's new "advanced AI research team "and Microsoft remains committed to OpenAI (Manish Singh/TechCrunch)
item.description:
Manish Singh / TechCrunch:
Satya Nadella says Sam Altman, Greg Brockman, and OpenAI staff will join Microsoft's new “advanced AI research team” and Microsoft remains committed to OpenAI  —  Microsoft has hired OpenAI co-founders Sam Altman and Greg Brockman to head up a “new advanced AI research team,” …

item.title: Source: dozens of OpenAI employees internally announced they are quitting after Ilya Sutskever told them that Sam Altman won 't return (Amir Efrati/The Information)
item.description:
Amir Efrati / The Information:
Source: dozens of OpenAI employees internally announced they are quitting after Ilya Sutskever told them that Sam Altman won't return  —  Dozens of OpenAI staffers internally announced they were quitting the company Sunday night, said a person with knowledge of the situation …

item.title: Sam Altman will not return as OpenAI CEO after talks broke down; OpenAI names Twitch co-founder Emmett Shear as interim CEO, per OpenAI director Ilya Sutskever (Amir Efrati/The Information)
item.description:
Amir Efrati / The Information:
Sam Altman will not return as OpenAI CEO after talks broke down; OpenAI names Twitch co-founder Emmett Shear as interim CEO, per OpenAI director Ilya Sutskever  —  Sam Altman won't return as CEO of OpenAI, despite efforts by the company's executives to bring him back, according to co-founder and board director Ilya Sutskever.

item.title: Source: OpenAI board members seek to hire their own CEO to succeed Sam Altman; sources: Mira Murati plans to rehire Altman and Greg Brockman in some capacity (Bloomberg)
item.description:
Bloomberg:
Source: OpenAI board members seek to hire their own CEO to succeed Sam Altman; sources: Mira Murati plans to rehire Altman and Greg Brockman in some capacity  —  - Murati remains in place as interim CEO after Altman firing  — Board members are simultaneously seeking a different CEO

item.title: Sources describe how ChatGPT 's success widened ideological rifts at OpenAI, and Ilya Sutskever began behaving like a spiritual leader expecting AGI 's arrival (The Atlantic)
item.description:
The Atlantic:
Sources describe how ChatGPT's success widened ideological rifts at OpenAI, and Ilya Sutskever began behaving like a spiritual leader expecting AGI's arrival  —  Sam Altman's weekend of shock and drama began a year ago, with the release of ChatGPT.  —  To truly understand the events …

item.title: Cruise co-founder and CEO Kyle Vogt resigns, a month after California 's DMV suspended Cruise 's permits to operate self-driving cars on public roads (TechCrunch)
item.description:
TechCrunch:
Cruise co-founder and CEO Kyle Vogt resigns, a month after California's DMV suspended Cruise's permits to operate self-driving cars on public roads  —  Kyle Vogt, the serial entrepreneur who co-founded and led Cruise from a startup in a garage through its acquisition and ownership by General Motors …
